entries.title_d: Escort the freighter along their route through Black Sun and Hidden Daggers aggression.
entries.title: Corellia System: Duty: Escort Merchant Freighters
entries.thanks_5: Some great flying pilot, wish I could pull those moves in this hunk of trash.
entries.thanks_4: Yes! That's how it's done. Show them what happens when they mess with us!
entries.thanks_3: I love you! I mean, thank you pilot...
entries.thanks_2: Not bad pilot, not bad at all.
entries.thanks_1: Nice moves pilot. I feel a lot more secure now.
entries.taunt_5: You don't want to mess with me CorSec.
entries.taunt_4: We're taking over, pack yourself out of here or face our wrath CorSec!
entries.taunt_3: Fear me, CorSec weakling! Whow I sound scary..is this thing still on...
entries.taunt_2: There's no escape, shut off your engines! We won't hurt you, promise.
entries.taunt_1: Time to fill my coffers with some more creds. Stay out of the way CorSec!
entries.shields_depleted: Our shields are breaking down! We're in big trouble!
entries.reason_5: Please help! The pirates are hot on our trail and we don't have the means to defend ourselves!
entries.reason_4: Help? We don't need help. Fine, you can tag along but stay out of our way.
entries.reason_3: Oh hi. I think we'll be fine but if you really want to escort us, we won't say no.
entries.reason_2: We're transporting spices worth a fortune and have been dodging pirates all over the system. Your a welcome sight CorSec.
entries.reason_1: So happy to see you pilot! We shook some pirates back there but I don't think they gave up.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Meet the freighter for escort here.
entries.quest_escort_d: One of the many freighter craft transversing this sector.
entries.panic_4: More pirates, we're done for now...
entries.panic_2: More pirates incoming! We can't defend ourselves, our fate is in your hands pilot!
entries.panic_1: Here they come, time to earn your pay CorSec!
entries.hull_half: Our hull is leaking! You have to get them off me, now!
entries.goodbye_5: You sure taught those pirates a lesson, thank you again pilot.
entries.goodbye_4: Fantastic, I never thought we'd made it alive! You are a lifesaver friend, thank you.
entries.goodbye_3: Thank you pilot, we would have been toast without you!
entries.goodbye_2: I knew I could count on the Ace pilots of the CorSec to bring us down safely. Thank you!
entries.goodbye_1: Praise the CorSec, we would never have made it without you.
entries.found_loc: \#pcontrast3 CorSec Command: < \#pcontrast1 We have another Merchant ship being chased by Pirates. Get over to these coordinates quickly pilot. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.failed_protect: \#pcontrast3 CorSec Command: < \#pcontrast1 The Merchant ship was about to be destroyed and had to make a quick jump to hyperspace. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.failed_destroy: \#pcontrast3 CorSec Command: < \#pcontrast1 All those civilians... I'm sure you did all you could pilot but we expect a full report on what happened. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.complete: \#pcontrast3 CorSec Command: < \#pcontrast1 Another merchant safely on the ground, great job pilot! \#pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_stopped: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Sensors indicate no more fighter vessels with armed weapon systems in area. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_notify: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Vessels on intercept course approaching, weapon systems armed. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.arrived_at_loc: \#pcontrast3 Nav Computer: < \#pcontrast1 You are at the correct coordinates. Freighter should arrive shortly. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.abort: Abort code received, preparing hyper jump out of the sector.
